attributes.action: Tommy Robinson. Stands for a majority of britain people and speaks the truth.
attributes.additional_details: Our government need to be assessed first in the ways they handle these cases. As in left and right politics. We need a more votable even response. Or just let the people vote. That would be the safest way.
attributes.background: The government are responsible for shutting up the truth especially with tommy Robinson. He will be remembered in the future of Britain. Yet hes being silenced. For his honesty. Which we all feel the same way. Leave Tommy alone. He speaks for the majority. Hes no racist. Hes no thug.
